user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (sarah@quantuminnovations.com) with his input on the “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat, and remind him to check his Gmail and Notion for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Your Input Needed for “Quantum Cohesion 2023” Retreat

Hi John,

Hope you’re doing well! As we finalize plans for the “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat, could you please share your thoughts and any suggestions you have? When you have a moment, kindly reply to me at sarah@quantuminnovations.com.

All the background materials are in your Gmail and on the Social Committee workspace in Notion, so feel free to review those before sending your feedback.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
